name: Machine Assembly Line (In Effect)
description:
Each time after the attached character takes DMG or is healed: Accumulate 1 point of Battle-Readiness (Max 2 points).
When you play a Weapon or Artifact with an original cost of no more Dice than you have Battle-Readiness points: Clear this state and play that card for free.
